verbs.description: [ARG0: sf officials] [V: running] [ARG1: tests on drinking water in sunset] [ARGM-TMP: after complaint about pesticides] san francisco water officials said monday night they ’re ramping up tests on drinking water in the city sunset district after an unconfirmed report on social media of supplies tainted with pesticides officials said they have no reason to believe there any problem with city water and have issued no advisories against drinking it the testing is being done according to the san francisco public utiltlies commission simply to alleviate conern the report of tainted water which was forwarded to the city monday was posted on the social networking site nextdoor by sunset residents who said their water tasted odd city officials said san francisco public utiltlies commission sierra nevada reporter san francisco public utilties commission water drinking water american west kurtis alexander san francisco fresno bee san francisco bay area tyler gamble bay area writer general assignment reporter san francisco chronicle nextdoor sf bay area news group

sf officials running tests on [V: drinking] [ARG1: water] in sunset after complaint about pesticides san francisco water officials said monday night they ’re ramping up tests on drinking water in the city sunset district after an unconfirmed report on social media of supplies tainted with pesticides officials said they have no reason to believe there any problem with city water and have issued no advisories against drinking it the testing is being done according to the san francisco public utiltlies commission simply to alleviate conern the report of tainted water which was forwarded to the city monday was posted on the social networking site nextdoor by sunset residents who said their water tasted odd city officials said san francisco public utiltlies commission sierra nevada reporter san francisco public utilties commission water drinking water american west kurtis alexander san francisco fresno bee san francisco bay area tyler gamble bay area writer general assignment reporter san francisco chronicle nextdoor sf bay area news group
